errors.name: AccountClosed
errors.msg: Account is closed or has zero lamports

errors.name: TreasuryDoesNotHoldAllSupply
errors.msg: Treasury does not hold the required token supply

errors.name: AuctionNotReadyToFinalize
errors.msg: Auction is not ready to finalize

errors.name: AuctionFailed
errors.msg: Auction has not reached the required amount to migrate

errors.name: AuctionSuccessful
errors.msg: Auction is successful and will migrate

errors.name: AlreadyTransferred
errors.msg: SOL has already been transferred to treasury

errors.name: FeesAlreadyDistributed
errors.msg: Protocol fees have already been distributed

errors.name: SolNotYetTransferred
errors.msg: SOL must be transferred to treasury before distributing fees

errors.name: FeesNotDistributed
errors.msg: Fees must be distributed before closing accounts
